derivation: a primitive root; also denominative from H7023 (קִיר)
outline:
1. (Qal) to bore, dig, dig for water
  2. to be cold
    1. (Hiphil) to make or keep cool
  3. (Pilpel) destroy, break down
kjv_def: break down, cast out, destroy, dig.
strongs_def: to trench; by implication, to throw forth;  to wall up, whether literal (to build a wall) or figurative (to estop)
